channel.title: Definitely A Serious Pretender Rework
channel.description:
Prsonally, Ive always tought that [color=grey]**Pretender**[/color] shouold be abut pretnding to be things, and curretn [color=grey]**Pretender**[/color] dosen't do tat! They just want to be knig, and tha makes no snense! i think they shuld have a gaol rework
so, ive made my own petrender rweork. I hope u enjoy!
> # [color=grey]Pretender[/color] > [color=grey]**Nuetral Killer**[/color] > **Night Immune // Occuppy Immune**
> **Pretended (Passive)** - u cannot claim Petrender or U DIE.**[color=red]IMPORTANT[/color]** > **Pretender Pressure (Day)** - force someone to vote for somebody they don't wat to > > **prison breakin (Day)** - u can talk in Prince chat even if not jailed - 3 uses > **mruder (Night)** - kill a player, they die - oo uses > **big mruder (Night)** - kill a player, they die. u cannot be executed tommorow. can be used when jailed - `4 uses (because it'd be useless if they only had one uSE!!!)
u win when you kill everybody
leave fedback in com ments! CNONSTRUCTIVE FEDBACK ONNLY!!!!!!!!!!

item.title: Definitely A Serious Pretender Rework
item.dc:creator: Icibalus
item.description:
Prsonally, Ive always tought that Pretender shouold be abut pretnding to be things, and curretn Pretender dosen’t do tat! They just want to be knig, and tha makes no snense! i think they shuld have a gaol rework

so, ive made my own petrender rweork. I hope u enjoy!

Pretender

Nuetral Killer
Night Immune // Occuppy Immune

Pretended (Passive) - u cannot claim Petrender or U DIE.IMPORTANT
Pretender Pressure (Day) - force someone to vote for somebody they don’t wat to

prison breakin (Day) - u can talk in Prince chat even if not jailed - 3 uses
mruder (Night) - kill a player, they die - oo uses
big mruder (Night) - kill a player, they die. u cannot be executed tommorow. can be used when jailed - `4 uses (because it’d be useless if they only had one uSE!!!)

u win when you kill everybody

leave fedback in com ments! CNONSTRUCTIVE FEDBACK ONNLY!!!

Read full topic
